alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:25PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Line of gusty thunderstorms moving into northwestern Indiana... At 1025 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty thunderstorms along a line from Beecher to Hopkins Park and Martinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gary, Merrillville, Schererville, Hobart, Crown Point, Cedar Lake, Lowell, Momence, Morocco, Lake Village, Griffith, Dyer, St. John, Lake Station, Crete, University Park, Lakes of the Four Seasons, Winfield, Beecher and Roselawn. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 257. This includes... Illiana Motor Speedway, Lake County Fairgrounds, and US 41 Dragway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
